resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: Although Ichikawa Danjuro V's nose is barely visible, this distinctive facial feaure allows the print viewers to immediately identify him as the actor playing this role.
resource.chars: Although Ichikawa Danjuro V's nose is barely visible, this distinctive facial feaure allows the print viewers to immediately identify him as the actor playing this role.
